body_html: @ZacBlanco : That should not be the case, it should work with any one functional mirror. Can you download https://mirror.bazel.build/www.nasm.us/pub/nasm/releasebuilds/2.12.02/nasm-2.12.02.tar.bz2 directly? (Wondering if for some reason your network is unable to reach this mirror either)

body: @ZacBlanco : That should not be the case, it should work with any one functional mirror. Can you download `https://mirror.bazel.build/www.nasm.us/pub/nasm/releasebuilds/2.12.02/nasm-2.12.02.tar.bz2` directly? (Wondering if for some reason your network is unable to reach this mirror either)
